first_translate: I won’t do  anything if you don’t want me to.
sorry...
it’s not that I didn’t like it.
huh...?
was he always this weak around me?
I hate how my heart is weakening toward him...

hangle: 이러다가 시그렌을 보내줘야 할 때 못 보내주면 어떡해?
first_translate: if things continue  like this, what will happen when I have to let go of siegren?

hangle: 시그렌을 향한 마음이 커지는 게 무서워.
first_translate: the thought of falling deeper for him scares me.
siegren.

hangle: 어쩌면 너하고 끝까지 가는 건 어려울지도 몰라.
first_translate: maybe we can’t take our relationship all the way through till the end.
let's talk later.
gosh...
even I think I’m being too selfish sometimes.
does siegren feel tired of me as well?

hangle: 차라리 지금 질리면 나도 마음이 편할 텐데.
first_translate: that would make everything easier on both of us.
lady fiona?
isn’t she--
this must be lady fiona.
crown prince.
your highness.
long time no see.
uh... sorry about that.
do your highness and I know each other from somewhere?
of course! anyway, now that abel isn’t here, I finally get to speak with you alone.

hangle: 그건 일단 넘어가고, 아벨이 없는 지금이 대화할 기회다.
first_translate: oh, really? that’s unfortunate.
oh, really? that’s unfortunate.
but I sent her such a nice gift.
a gift?

hangle: 난 황실에서 무언가를 받은 적이 없는데?
first_translate: I’ve never received any gifts from the palace before.
wait a minute...
“the client was someone higher than haylon.”
then that bastard was behind it after all!

hangle: 제가… 전하께 실례를 저지른 일이라도 있던가요?
first_translate: did I ever offend his highness somehow?
you did.
but more importantly, there was something wrong with that man named siegren.
stop calling him “that man” already.
in any case,  I had hoped to surprise you with a little present.
unfortunately,  I wasn’t able to achieve the results I wanted.

hangle: 그래도 내가 영애는 아벨 공작과 달리…
first_translate: still, unlike duke abel,
I still hold you in good regard.
as long as you stay out of trouble,
excuse me.
there were some bugs sitting here.
how dare you treat me so disrespectfully!
just because duke abel favors you doesn’t mean you’re better than everyone else!!!
at least nobody saw us just then.
or are you counting on siegren protecting you?

hangle: 시그렌 녀석이 여차하면 널 지켜줄 거라 믿는 건가?
first_translate: or are you counting on siegren protecting you?
I protect myself.

hangle: 흥, 그래봤자 사생아 새끼들끼리 붙어먹은 주제에…
first_translate: hmph, but at the end of the day, you two bastards are nothing but illegitimate children.

hangle: 아니면, 설마 아벨 공작도 그 몸으로 꼬셔낸 건가?
first_translate: or perhaps you seduced duke abel into taking care of you?

hangle: 진짜 혈육도 아닌데 아끼는 모습이 수상하다 싶더니.
first_translate: no wonder he treats you so nicely even though you aren’t related by blood.
argh!!!
th-that hurts!!!
alright... I understand where you’re coming from, your highness.

hangle: 세상에는 입으로 말이 아닌 쓰레기를 내뱉는 자들이 있는 법이니까요.
first_translate: after all, there are people in this world whose mouths spew trash instead of words.
why, you insolent wench!!!
h-huh?! hey!
I dodged them, as you can clearly see.

hangle: 제 반사 신경이 그렇게 나쁜 편이 아니라서요.
first_translate: my reflexes aren’t bad enough to miss those attacks.

hangle: 황족을 이렇게 건드리고 멀쩡할 것 같아?!
first_translate: and you think you’ll walk away unscathed after hitting royalty?!
I swear I’ll punish y--!
feel free to say whatever you’d like.

hangle: 사람들에게 가서, 본인 입으로 직접 말하세요.
first_translate: go ahead and tell others yourself.

hangle: 전하보다 신분도 낮고 약해 보이는 영애에게 말싸움도 지고,
first_translate: tell them how you lost a verbal fight against a lowly noblewoman...
...and got beaten up one-sidedly.
hrgh...
hey.
what are you doing right now?
can’t you stop holding onto that?!
oops, big problem.
if I leave him like this, he might break the crown prince’s arm.

hangle: 이런 문제는 나중에 조용히 되갚아 줘야 한다고!
first_translate: when dealing with these kinds of problems, you gotta pay back quietly afterward!
okay, let’s go home.
and your highness,

hangle: 다음에는 쓰레기가 아닌 말을 내뱉으시길 바랍니다.
first_translate: try saying something worthwhile next time.
ngh...
I guess I provoked him too much.
now he’s going to become even more annoying...

hangle: 그 자식은 왜 자꾸 네 곁에 집적거리는 거야?
first_translate: why does he keep bothering you?
I wish I knew why.
anyway, you handled that pretty well.

hangle: 저번에 이어 두 번째로 그놈의 손목을 부러뜨릴 뻔했어.
first_translate: for a moment there,  I almost broke his wrist again.

hangle: 너라면 진짜 할 것 같아서 겁나.
first_translate: knowing you,  I wouldn’t put it past you either.
fiona...
hm? what is it?
are you mad or something?
earlier, you ran off suddenly while we were on the balcony.
I suppose that’s how it looked to siegren.
well...
I hope you weren’t angry.
to be honest,
the idea of losing your affection...
...is terrifying.
so...
...I’m scared.
siegren...?
